data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Data::RuledValidator is validator of various data. I think
    validation rule should be in one place and It should be separeted
    from code.

    and if it is easy to read/write for not programmer, it is very
    good. I beleve Data::RuledeValidator can do it well.

    The usage of this is very simple and you can add/modify validation
    check easily without modifing your code. You have to change just a
    rule which is separated from code.
